name: wixtoolset-compiler
description: Node wrapper to compile EXE Installers to MSI
readme:
# node-msiwrapper-compiler
Node wrapper to compile EXE Installers to MSI

This is a simple node wrapper of [MSI Wrapper](http://www.exemsi.com/) compiler: MsiWrapperBatch.exe, and it's inspired by [node-innosetup-compiler](https://github.com/felicienfrancois/node-innosetup-compiler)

### OS Support

##### Windows

Works natively on windows

##### Linux & Mac OS X

Not supported yet.

### Usage

```shell
msiwrapper-compiler --config=myfile.xml
```

_Note_:

For creating XML file, simply run the GUI `MsiWrapper.exe` that is located into `C:\Users\[YOURUSER]\AppData\Roaming\npm\node_modules\msiwrapper-compiler\bin` or download and install a fresh installation of MsiWrapper from http://www.exemsi.com/.


##### Node JS

```shell
npm install fabvla/node-msiwrapper-compiler
```

### Credits

Thanks to Jacob Reinholdt for the amazing work on MSI Wrapper.
Thanks also to [felicienfrancois](https://github.com/felicienfrancois/node-innosetup-compiler) for the NodeJS Innosetup compiler.
